heading: Our Mission
Des: To make quality education accessible through AI-powered tools and personalized feedback, aligning with Google's mission to organize information and make it universally accessible and useful

heading: Our Team
Des: Dedicated professionals combining expertise in AI, education, and Google technologies to create innovative solutions for the Google Solution Challenge 2025

heading: Technologies
Des: Built with various Google technologies including Google Cloud Platform, Firebase, and other Google APIs to deliver a seamless and powerful educational experience
